entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to fix CS9236? #78347
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10530.88 #78397

Updated

  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
    Backlog
  • dotnet_sort_system_directives_first and dotnet_separate_import_directive_groups (IDE0055) don't generate warnings #78391
  • IDE0040 CodeFix with omit_if_default remove `fixed` keyword from field. #78395
  • Remove and Sort usings is not working #77363
  • Parameter hint truncated at call site #77355
  • Optimize temporary string usage when DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler is used #77597
  • Record synthesized implementation of PrintMembers calls object overload for string #78339
    Next
  • Create an 'Indenting String Builder' type to allow users to easily generate C# code that looks good, with almost no overhead. #71162
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" #76934
    .NET 10
  • Comment templates doesn't respect end_of_line = lf in .editorconfig #23143
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure hover markdown for supported platforms uses non-breaking spaces for indentation #78405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Repack RoslynAnalyzer packages separately from Roslyn packages #78404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extract out an interface for our LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78401
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature to 'main' #78400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Adjust LocalBinderFactory.VisitInvocationExpression to handle attributes on extension parameter #78399
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge branch 'main' into 'UserDefinedCompoundAssignment' #78398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Additional tests to complete the test plan #78396
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators

Updated

  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Move runtime async method validation into initial binding #78310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
